EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 4 - OpenStack c
EmailTemplate.subject: OpenStack changes the game for complex conglomerate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> OpenStack changes the game for a global conglomerate Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
How do you “conglomerate” a private cloud? It’s not as complicated as it sounds.
Read our case study to discover how an OpenStack private cloud solution changed the game for a South Korean global conglomerate. This complex organization, with many companies, is benefiting from a new approach to cloud hosting by:
- Strengthening its position as a strategic service provider - Substantially raising its protection levels - Leveraging economies of scale. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
